message:
很適合各位大大申請啊~

The Antonio Pizzigati Prize for Software in the Public Interest annually awards a $10,000 cash grant to one individual who has created or led an effort to create an open source software product of significant value to the nonprofit sector and movements for social change.
story: Pei-Chi Lo shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: For more than 35 years, great ideas have thrived at Tides. We provide sophisticated financial and management services - and inspiration - to donors and doers so they can focus on achieving their vision of a just world.
name: Antonio Pizzigati Prize for Software in the Public Interest
caption: tides.org
